text:
(Cocoon 2.1.7 / Lenya 178787 OR Cocoon 2.1.7 / Lenya 179027)

Unitemplate publication (cannot be tested in Default publication - since asset
upload/insert does not work there, see bug 35152)

- BXE creates <asset>'s instead of <lenya:asset>'s -> schema error

WORKED with Cocoon 2.1.7 / Lenya 165600

(I always used BXE 1.1.0-dev r1275)
